item.description: Join us for New Years Eve and help us celebrate as we move into 2013. We have a great night of Dance and Karaoke, party favors, Champagne toast at midnight, great fun, food, dance and karaoke. This is sure to be a great night of fun and a chance to make some new acquaintances. Tickets are available in advance for $10 and $15 at the door. But I am sure that this event will sell out, as it did last year. Please contact me for advanced ticket purchases. Great opportunity to celebrate New Years at a great place, and a reasonable cost. Hope to see you here on NYE.
item.name: New Years Eve Dance & Karaoke Party
